title: Snow Rider 3D
description: Owned/Acquired by gamersplayhub@gmail.com. Would you like to ride on a sleigh? Then, no need to go anywhere. Because now, you can experience riding a sleigh for free anytime you want in Snow Ride 3D. Although you are not actually on a sleigh, you will feel like you’re actually riding one because the game is in 3D. Try to go as far as you can to get high score. You may also collect gifts to purchase sleigh.
instructions: Up arrow key or W - Jump Left arrow key or A - Steer Left Right arrow key or D - Steer Right

title: Cute Christmas Bull Difference
description: Cute Christmas Bull Difference is interesting kids game with Christmas theme and it's time for you to have fun! In this game you need to find the differences in these funny images. Behind these pictures are small differences. Can you find them? They are fun designs for you to play with. A game that is fun and educational because it will help you improve your observation and concentration skills. You have 8 levels and 7 differences, for each level you have one minute to finish the same. Have fun!
instructions: Use your mouse to play the game or tap on the screen!

title: Christmas 2020 Spot Differences
description: Spot 5 differences between the two pictures of the christmas within the giving time. The faster, the higher of the socres. You can click the "Hint" button for help. Enjoy 15 cool levels of the christmas.
instructions: Use mouse to click the differences to spot them.

title: Bullet League Robogeddon
description: Prepare to experience beautifully brutal gunplay in its purest form with this Bullet League Robogeddon game. Your enemy? A horde of cold, calculated, unfeeling robots. Your objective? Simple – be the last man, or should we say boar, standing! This gritty contest of guts is one of the best platformer shooting games we’ve ever played. It brings all the fun of a 2D battle royale game to your device with none of the long wait times or “laggy” connection issues. All you have to do is load this up in your web browser and play! No downloads, no spectating, just action. When in doubt, just hold that trigger down and let it spray! Speaking of, let’s break down the gameplay a little bit more so you can get a sense of what’s waiting for you out there. After all, you wouldn’t want to enter this deadly battle zone unprepared, now would you?
instructions: Find guns, build walls and shoot your enemies. Be the last man standing in this all out brawl Movement: WASD Fire/Build: Left Mouse Button Inventory: 1, 2, 3, 4, ,5

title: Sift Renegade Brawl
description: Play this incredible exclusive game from kiz10.com called Sift Renegade Brawl totally free !!! In this game full of action and fights between stickman master samurai in a world where revenge and fights between clans is common, our main Hero called Ryu arrives, who was calm enjoying the peace accompanied by his beautiful girlfriend and in a total change of history will face a mission of revenge enjoy this excellent game on kiz10 totally free. The objective of this excellent game is to avenge the death of Ryu's girlfriend, a master of samurai, who must avenge the death of his girlfriend. The mission so dangerous and so many obstacles. Use your katana to cut all enemies. Make incredible combos to eliminate them with style. In the course of the game and the different levels you will be able to collect many trophies and improve your score as many times as you need to play each level again. Enjoy the story and help Ryu to complete all the missions!
instructions: AWSD Mouse for Attack or touch

title: Tour of The Santa Claus
description: You can build the pictures of tours of the Santa Claus. This is looks like a picture story. You have to complete 30 images for Santa's tour. You have 30 Levels and you have to unlock one by one for the Santa's tour. Enjoy!
instructions: Drag and drop the image parts on the correct position.

title: Among them Hide N Seek 2
description: Hidden time for Among US. It's still peek-a-boo. In this maze, use baffles to hide. Dodge the catchers and get as many mobile diamonds as possible. Or be a captor and find out the hidden ones!
instructions: Slide to play.

title: Christmas Jigsaw Challenge
description: Christmas Jigsaw Challenge is game about Christmas! The most realistic jigsaw experience you can get on a smart phone. It is a fun jigsaw puzzle game applicable for all ages. Are you ready for the breath of holiday spirit, cheer and merriment? Christmas Jigsaw Challenge for kids are ideal for the practicing concentration, reflexes and having some “Merry Christmas” cheer. If you think that you have the skills and feel like jigsaw puzzles game is too easy, just set the difficulty level to hard and give “ChristmasJigsaw Challenge free” another go. Have fun playing.
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: Draw Defence
description: Draw-Defence is a simple tower defense game. There are enemies that attack your castle. You need to protect your homeland. Draw the different lines to summon kinds of soldiers. Enemies will be stronger, you must improve your equipment to beat them.
instructions: drag to draw

title: Math Word Search
description: Math Word Search is a combination of Mathematics with a Word Search, a game that has the function of stimulating people’s memory in addition to teaching math with a lot of fun. In this game there are two modes (easy and difficult), the “difficult” being the most challenging, with a system of time and points multiplied, making the player finish with many more points than in the easy mode. Find the results of mathematical operations hidden in Word Search for each level. Good luck and have fun!
instructions: Use mouse on desktop or touch buttons on your mobile device.

title: Super Tetris
description: Super Tetris is a casual game where the blocks fall and must be placed in the empty spaces. Fit blocks and form an entire line to destroy lines of blocks and earn points. Accumulate combos by destroying consecutive lines and try to win with as many points as possible. This game is inspired by the acclaimed Tetris, one of the first games ever created. The graphics are colorful and beautiful and the animations are exciting. Good luck and good fun!
instructions: Use mouse on desktop or touch buttons on your mobile device.

title: Guess the Color
description: Guess the Color is an educational game designed to teach kids all about colors. It will also test the young one's reflexes. A color pencil will show up and the kids will just select the answer yes or no. You need to answer as many as you can before your time runs out. It's a fun and enjoying game that little ones with love.
instructions: Use mouse or tap to screen to play this game!

title: Ninja Jump Mini Game
description: You have to collect the coins for your score and jump without falling and go to end to complete the game. You can tap on the screen or press space bar on the keyboard or use game pad. Enjoy!
instructions: Tap on the screen or press space bar on the keyboard or use game pad.

title: Magnificent Tower
description: Tap to construct new office tower floors. Time your placements for the maximum score. Deploy power ups on your tower construction, such as Reverse, Repeat, Insurance, and Double Coins Build your magnificent tower!
instructions: Construct your office tower. How high can you go?

title: Cube Flip
description: Cube Flip is inspired by classic grid puzzle games. Challenging levels with a proper difficulty curve and colorful visuals with relaxing music keeps you focused in the game. Have Fun!
instructions: Use WASD or the arrow keys to control your cube. If you get stuck, press R to restart the level. Collect all of the colored square tiles to unlock the gray exit tile. Watch out for spikes, and make sure you don't get stuck!

title: Tower of Colors Island Edition
description: Shoot balls to match the color of the tower blocks.Rotate the tower to find the best spots. Collect coins to use power ups such as wildcard and spinning lasers.Check back every day to collect your daily rewards.
instructions: Match colors to destroy tower blocks

title: Pop Pop Jingle
description: Happy Holidays for everyone as you pop-pop all the winter gems using fast reflexes and strategy! An addictive and easy to play Match-3 Puzzle Shooter packed with over 100 festive themed levels. Can you collect all the stars?
instructions: Connecting three or more identical baubles makes them pop-pop! When all baubles are popped, you win! If baubles reach the bottom, or you run out of time, you lose! Earn more stars by completing the level faster.

title: Claw Crane
description: Cute, cuddly aliens find themselves on lost in space. Use the claw crane to pick them up and transport them to safety. Use a variety of powerups to improve your pick-ratio. From freeze, to combo points, to extra time, there's a whole lot to claw on!
instructions: Control the claw crane to pick up aliens

title: Tappy Flappy Trump
description: Tappy Flappy Trump is fun flying game suitable for all ages. This time you need to guide our lovley Trump all the way to the goal. Very funny game that helps you spend some time in this time of year. Avoid obstacles, fly throw circles, collect corona icons and have fun. 5 leves of fun and each level is harder than the previous one. Ons again, enjoy playing and come back for more free games.
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: Hide N Seek!
description: You are locked in a maze with the other matchmakers. The game has two modes. The first is that you run away, evade your captors for a limited time, and collect diamonds. The second is you as the captor, looking for escapees hiding in the maze, you can't see them. Only luck and a mighty brain! Wish you stick to more levels.
instructions: Slide to control.

title: Crazy Math
description: Crazy Math is one of the most educational math games. Test how quickly you can perform math operations by selecting the difficulty level. If you can get over 50 points in the hard section, you are really a very smart person.
instructions: Tab on correct button

title: Paper Flick
description: Aim and throw the paper ball into the basket. How accurate are you? Fun office environment. It's just perfect for killing time. Choose from 3 difficulties: easy, medium and hard.

title: Love Pin 3D
description: Love Pin 3D is an interesting puzzle game. Your bride has been caught by bad guys, use your brain to avoid bad guys, find your lover. There are many funny levels that need you to find your girl. You are a smart man, pay attention to the order of pull out the bolts.
instructions: Click to pull out the bolts

title: Turn Me On
description: It is a weird adventure of a button. Click on it to guide it to its place. Get help from the other objects on the platform as well. Collect the gears on the way to score more!
instructions: Find a way to get the red button in the box. Use the objects in its surroundings to achieve this goal.

title: Perfect Snipe Online
description: Find your way to defeat opponents. Perfect Snipe is a free online first person shooter where you assume the role of a special force sniper. Use you special tactics to defeat all enemies in each level. Every level is a new challenge. Are you ready to be the best sniper in the world?. Shoot the keys to collect and upgrade your weapons andChrosshairs. Complete more than 20 levels and enjoy this awesome action adventure shooter game.
instructions: Point and shoot

title: Neon Catapult
description: Neon Catapult is a very fun casual game in NEON Style that will test your skills and reasoning. With a "Drag and Drop" system you can pull the elastic to make the ball bounce and knock down the targets. Try to finish each level with as few balls as possible to get more points. You can pop boxes of TNT explosives to break more than one target at the same time and save balls. The designs are beautiful and colorful.
instructions: Use mouse or tap to screen to play this game!

title: Car Girl Garage
description: Don't have any mechanic skills? Think again! You can do more than you think and Miriam will show you! Miriam just inherited her grandfather's old garage. She wants to restore the place to its former glory and she hired YOU to help her out! Fix the workshop, restore an old Beetle and learn about fixing cars! This game will teach you how to: - Swap a wheel - Check your oil - Replace your car battery - Top up your coolant - Check your tire pressure - Replace your air filter And much more! Tap, swipe, drag and drop your way through the garage. Learn how to fix your car in a playful way. Together we can do this!
instructions: You have to find the hidden tools to fix your car then follow the instructions written at the top of the game screen.

title: Zumba Mania
description: Get better at marble shooting and try to complete all the levels with three stars in each level. This marble game is easy to play and addicting at the same time.
instructions: Tap to shoot. Match 3 or more same-colored marbles to eliminate them. Destroy all marbles in the chain before it hits the end. Tap the frog to swap between the current and next marble. Use power-ups to clear the board faster.

title: Pen Run Online
description: Pen-Run-Online is an interesting arcade game. Have you seen the pen running? Here you go. Slide to run the pen on the table. Collect other pens. Pay attention to avoid the book, pen container, and another. When you arrive at the end, the extra pens you collect will be take in the book.
instructions: slide to move

title: Cannon Surfer
description: Cannon-Surfer is an interesting arcade game. You will push a ball cannon to arrive at the end. Stay away from the blocks. Remember to integrate the tank, with the tank improving, you could beat the boss easily. If you can not handle it, there is a rainbow shell on your right that will help you.
instructions: drag to move

title: Space Pursuit
description: Try to shoot all of the enemies trying to chase you down. Collect weapons and power ups to help you stay alive for as long as possible. Keep flying, dodging and doing whatever it takes to survive in this epic retro themed space game.
instructions: Arrow keys or tap left/right to move

title: Hop Ball
description: Come on! Test your reflexes and hop skills! Hop Ball is a ball game that lets ball hop on the tiles until the end of the color road. This game will create a whole new experience for ball game fans.
instructions: Swipe the screen or move the mouse to jump balls on tile's color, hop ball on them and control carefully! Keep calm and go as far as possible in this ball game!

title: Invace Spaders
description: Invace Spaders is a simple space adventure game, where you try to defeat as many aliens as possible before being destroyed. This is and endless game, where the player can go on forever as long as it’s alive. There are two bonuses in the game: One slowing down enemies for 5 seconds when it’s been collected by the player, and the other spawning a “laser line” which clears out every enemy on the screen.
instructions: One touch control

title: Laser Overload
description: Cover art Laser Puzzle - Logic GameViktor BohushPuzzleRated for 3+906Contains Ads·Offers in-app purchasesYou don't have any devices.Add to Wishlist Screenshot ImageScreenshot ImageScreenshot ImageScreenshot ImageThe goal of this puzzle game is to set up mirrors so all lights bulbs become turned on. You have for this different types of mirrored surfaces which reflect laser beams in different ways.LASER PUZZLE FEATURES:• 300+ levels of varying complexity.• Square and hexagon game fields.• Various mirrors for controlling the laser beam.• Beautiful and simple UI.• Intuitive gameplay.• Dark / light theme.• Hint system.• No time limit.This logic puzzle promote your problem-solving skills, which helps keep your mind sharp as you think about how to set up mirrors to light up all light bulbs.Move mirrors, reflect the laser, light up all lamps!
instructions: In this logic puzzle game, place mirrors to direct the lasers to the proper exit!Guess the orientation of the mirrors with logic only. No random moves.Can you solve the 1100 levels of increasing difficulty?Features:+ 1100 levels for beginners and experts+ Free unlimited use of hints when you are stuck+ Collect a star in each level

title: Draw Climber Online
description: Draw Climber 2 is an interesting race game. You have to draw a leg that makes sure the block could move. You will race with another block, there are obstacles will on your way. Be smart, change the shape of legs anytime that you could pass any obstacles.

Play with your friends and try to beat new records with each game. Good luck and have fun!

title: Halloween Hidden Numbers
description: Halloween Hidden Numbers is a beautiful online game with hidden numbers. Find out the hidden numbers in the specified images. Each level has 10 numbers from 1 to 10. There are 6 levels in total. The time is limited so be fast and find all hidden numbers before time runs out. Clicking in the wrong place several times reduces the time by an additional 5 seconds. So, if you are ready start the game and have fun!

description: Halloween Word Search is a casual game that has the function of stimulating people’s memories. In addition, according to studies, it can rejuvenate the brain of elderly people. In addition to these benefits, it is a game that can generally be beneficial for people of all ages. Find the words hidden in the letter board for each level. Good luck and have fun!

title: Orc Hunter Halloween
description: A flock of orcs are coming. The safety of the magical kingdom is at stake. You are a young and powerful wizard; Use your magic to defeat the orcs to protect your magical kingdom. 36 levels to play! Enjoy! Happy Halloween!

title: Super Hitmasters Online
description: Become a spy and catch all your enemies to complete the levels. Start with simple puzzles and then advance to some challenging levels! Collect coins and unlock tons of weapons, clothes, and characters and prepare your arsenal. Complete exciting levels and game modes, make your decisions wisely and dont let any enemy alive!
instructions: Mouse or Touch for Play

description: A great and addictive game to train your eyes and brain. Match groups of the same tiles to destroy them. Many challenges to play. Enjoy and happy Halloween.

description: Fire egg and rescue your chicken friends! If you hit the chicken coop…. You will be with sad ending.. Now, Let’s go to the chicken coop! Upgrade to become the strongest chicken!

description: This is the very interesting game what you never payed. Game controller is your voice/blowing, you have to blow to mic to move rocket up. I will make more games like this and for more fun. Enjoy!

title: StickMan Jump Fun
description: Stickman Jump Fun is fun addictive skill game help you relax after working or learning. Avoid the deadly obstacles and jump as high as you can to score more and challenge your friends and test their skill.

Help our lovely Dora collect as many diamonds as possible. Pay attention to let Dora's feet fall into the space, or the game will fail. Jump around and have fun!

title: Duck Hunter
description: Duck Hunter - is new classic game. Move the scope and shot the ducks before they fly away from the screen, and the dog will help you. Show everyone who is the best hunter here!

title: Spot the Difference 2
description: We're back with the 2nd edition of our popular Spot the Difference game. Find 3 differences each, between the two pictures. Pictures range from animals, to people, to household items and scenic views. Can you solve the puzzle before the time runs out?
